attributes.action: Create further measures tackling knife crime in London and throughout the UK
attributes.additional_details: There have been more than 30 stabbings in London this year so far.
attributes.background: In 2018, there were 40,000 stabbings in England and Wales alone. We want further measures in place preventing and tackling this epidemic and creating a safer environment for citizens throughout the UK.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the UK Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We understand that you are concerned about knife crime, but are not sure what exactly you would like the UK Government or Parliament to do. 

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do to tackle knife crime. 

You might also like to sign these petitions: 

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/233926
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/231568
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/245004
